attributes.action: Demand that the British People have a referendum on the European Treaty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Lisbon treaty is a surrender of the British Constitution.
Yet no British politician has the guts to tell the British people the truth.
It is time for Labour and the rest of the parties to put it to the vote.
Give the voters what has been promised to us.
A referendum

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
